title: Food Combining Simplified [static PDF]
description:
Title: Food Combining Simplified
Subtitle: How To Get The Most From Your Food
Author: Dennis Nelson
Year: 1985
ID: LOC Cat# 83-61638

-----
32 pages + covers
Scan, static conversion (non-OCR) and bookmarking done by Greencuppa.
-----

[b]Content headings include...[/b]
 Classification of Foods
 Rationale of Food Combining
 Digestion of Foods
 Incompatible Combinations
 Our Frugivorous Heritage
 Meal Planning

An overview of the rationale behind, and the practice of, the principles of Food Combining. The booklet was published to make such information readily available in format both simple and inexpensive. It was not intended to replace the original work on the subject, "Food Combining Made Easy" by Dr. Herbert Shelton, which is widely considered the 'bible' on the subject and should be read by anyone desiring a more thorough treatment of the subject matter in question.
